column5: Finally put the boat away for the season and while winterizing I noticed a new clicking noise when lowering the motor. Anyone know what that means? Aside form more money?
Boat  = Break Out Another Thousand.  Maybe just the relays clicking.
I agree  Make sure you firmly pressing the button for the trim...  When it clicks does the motor hesitate lowering?
Nope the trim works fine and the clicking seems to be coming from the other part/cylinder beside the one with the rod coming out of it. It's kind of bullet shaped
perhaps a bit of air in the system?
It worked perfectly 2 weeks ago and I didn't use since, it was cold out I wonder if that makes a difference...
Put grease on the ends of the trim ram rods
